name: Simple Discord contrast
description:
Removes unnecessary transparency.
Sets the text colour to white on dark theme, and to black on light theme.
Sets the fonts to system fonts that can render better.
Might slightly increase performance on low end devices.
additional_info:
2020-02-27Z: Fixed for latest version.
2020-02-24Z: Redone.
2020-02-04Z: updated for the 2020-02-04 Discord update.
